section.title: Advanced VEO3 Prompt Generator Features
section.subtitle: Everything you need to create professional VEO3 video prompts with perfect structure and detail.

features.title: Multi-Character Support
features.description: Create prompts with up to 3 characters, each with unique speech, emotions, and appearance details.

features.title: Professional Camera Controls
features.description: Define shot types, camera movements, and POV settings for cinematic VEO3 video generation.

features.title: Audio & Speech Integration
features.description: Add dialogue, sound effects, and ambient audio instructions to your VEO3 prompts.

features.title: Visual Style Customization
features.description: Control lighting, color palettes, and visual aesthetics for perfect VEO3 video style.

features.title: Instant Prompt Generation
features.description: Generate optimized VEO3 prompts instantly with our advanced AI prompt builder.

features.title: Copy & Export Ready
features.description: Get perfectly formatted VEO3 prompts ready to copy and paste into your video generator.

veo3Features.title: VEO3 Neural Network Capabilities
veo3Features.description: Advanced video generation with unprecedented quality and control

capabilities.title: 4K Resolution
capabilities.description: Generate videos up to 4K resolution with crystal clear quality

capabilities.title: Extended Duration
capabilities.description: Create videos up to 2 minutes long with consistent quality

capabilities.title: Realistic Physics
capabilities.description: Advanced understanding of real-world physics and motion

capabilities.title: Temporal Consistency
capabilities.description: Maintains character and object consistency across frames

capabilities.title: Dynamic Lighting
capabilities.description: Realistic lighting effects and shadows throughout the video

capabilities.title: Complex Motion
capabilities.description: Handles complex camera movements and object interactions

tips.title: Clear Scene Description
tips.description: Start with the main subject and action, then add environmental details
tips.example: A woman walking through a bustling Tokyo street at night, neon signs reflecting on wet pavement

tips.title: Specify Camera Work
tips.description: Include camera angles, movements, and shot types for better control
tips.example: Medium shot, tracking the subject with smooth dolly movement

tips.title: Lighting Details
tips.description: Describe lighting conditions for mood and atmosphere
tips.example: Dramatic chiaroscuro lighting with strong shadows

tips.title: Visual Style
tips.description: Reference specific visual styles or cinematographic techniques
tips.example: Shot in the style of a Wes Anderson film with symmetrical framing

tips.title: Motion Description
tips.description: Be specific about how objects and characters should move
tips.example: Slow motion as the dancer leaps through falling autumn leaves

tips.title: Timing Cues
tips.description: Include timing references for better pacing control
tips.example: The camera slowly zooms in over 5 seconds to reveal the character's expression

settings.description: Choose based on your target platform
Controls how strongly the style is applied
Controls the amount of motion in the video

examples: Like a scene from Blade Runner 2049
In the style of Christopher Nolan
